QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, nmc_canvas_available_elements.id odf_pk, nmc_canvas_available_elements.CANVAS_MODULE_ID as canvas_module_id, nmc_canvas_available_elements.code as code, nmc_canvas_available_elements.IS_SELECTED as is_selected, nmc_canvas_available_elements.ASSOCIATED_TYPE as associated_type, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, nmc_canvas_available_elements.UI_VIEW_ID as ui_view_id, nmc_canvas_available_elements.ASSOCIATED_INSTANCE_ID as associated_id, CAPTIONS.NAME as name, nmc_canvas_available_elements.OBJECT_ALIAS as object_alias, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, nmc_canvas_available_elements.POSITION as position, NMC_CANVAS_AVAILABLE_ELEMENTS.CREATED_DATE as created_date, odf_ca_canvas_avl_element.partition_code as partition_code, NMC_CANVAS_AVAILABLE_ELEMENTS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date , user_context.user_id odf_user_id from nmc_canvas_available_elements nmc_canvas_available_elements inner join (select u.id user_id, u.user_name, u.locale, l.language_code from cmn_sec_users u, cmn_languages l where u.language_id = l.id) user_context on user_context.user_id = user_context.user_id , nmc_canvas_modules nmc_canvas_modules, srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED, cmn_captions_nls CAPTIONS, odf_ca_canvas_avl_element odf_ca_canvas_avl_element where 1 = 1 and nmc_canvas_available_elements.canvas_module_id = nmc_canvas_modules.id and nmc_canvas_available_elements.created_by = CREATED.user_id and nmc_canvas_available_elements.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id and CAPTIONS.table_name = 'NMC_CANVAS_AVAILABLE_ELEMENTS' and CAPTIONS.pk_id = nmc_canvas_available_elements.id and CAPTIONS.language_code = user_context.language_code and nmc_canvas_available_elements.id = odf_ca_canvas_avl_element.id
